querydef.query: dataprovider=metcoop_eps_control_2500m; point_interpolation=nearest; reftime=${metcoop_eps_control_2500m}; parameter="air pressure at sea level" ,"cloud area fraction" ,"cloud area fraction in atmosphere layer" ,"relative humidity" ,"x wind" ,"y wind" ,"wind speed of gust" ,"precipitation amount" ,"low estimate of precipitation amount" ,"middle estimate of precipitation amount" ,"high estimate of precipitation amount" ,"probability of precipitation" ,"thunderstorm probability" ,"max wind speed within 10 km";

dataprovider=met eceps small domain v.1.1; point_interpolation=nearest; parameter="air pressure at sea level" ,"cloud area fraction" ,"cloud area fraction in atmosphere layer" ,"relative humidity" ,"yr weather symbol" ,"probability of yr weather symbol" ,"x wind" ,"y wind" ,"probability of wind speed" ,"lwe thickness of precipitation amount";

dataprovider=met eceps large domain v.1.1; point_interpolation=nearest; parameter="air pressure at sea level" ,"cloud area fraction" ,"cloud area fraction in atmosphere layer" ,"relative humidity" ,"yr weather symbol" ,"probability of yr weather symbol" ,"x wind" ,"y wind" ,"probability of wind speed" ,"lwe thickness of precipitation amount";
